summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Jeffrey Epstein's account, detailing transactions for May 2017. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and account balances, highlighting significant outgoing transfers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, which details his account activities.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A significant outgoing money transfer of $175,000.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Balance Summary
events.description: The ending balance of Jeffrey Epstein's account as of May 31, 2017, was $646,794.63.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Jeffrey Epstein's account.
The beginning balance of the account on May 1, 2017, was $524,447.66.
A total of $600,000.00 was deposited into the account during May 2017.
Significant outgoing transfers included $175,000.00 on May 19 and $25,116.14 on May 31.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2017, was $646,794.63.
